data.text: @shuja_2006 खुद इतने गंदे हैं इसलिए दूसरों को भी वही समझते हैं

@shuja_2006 Is it even worth talking about? These guys need rehab and education. I pity their miserable lives. This guy #YogiAdityanath and whatever is the other guy's name hallucinate all the time that Hindu Khatre mein hai. #India will take care on 10 March.
